paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: primarily neurological involvement (TTR-FAP, familial amyloid polyneuropathy) or primarily cardiac involvement (TTR-FAC, familial amyloid cardiomyopathy)

functional_data.summary: The most prevalent genetic ATTR mutation is p.Val30Met, which is often associated with polyneuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
key_quotes: The most prevalent genetic ATTR mutation is p.Val30Met, which is often associated with polyneuropathy.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR gene variant was extracted successfully.
